body:
Hello,

I made this topic for anyone who has questions about mostly anything regarding Windows 10, whether it be the upgrade to Windows 10 or the features in Windows 10 I hope this thread will help you learn something :) 

Feel free to leave questions about Windows 10 in the reply section below :D
body_tagged:
Hello,

I made this topic for anyone who has questions about mostly anything regarding Windows 10, whether it be the upgrade to Windows 10 or the features in Windows 10 I hope this thread will help you learn something :) 

Feel free to leave questions about Windows 10 in the reply section below :D
title: Windows 10 Questions

replies.body: If I install Win10. All my things will be deleted?. I have Win7
replies.body_tagged: If I install Win10. All my things will be deleted?. I have Win7

replies.body: No. From research I've done it gives you the choice to keep all your files & internet history, to delete your internet history but keep your files, or do a full clean and delete everything
replies.body_tagged: No. From research I've done it gives you the choice to keep all your files & internet history, to delete your internet history but keep your files, or do a full clean and delete everything

replies.body: I can confirm what vlad said. I made the update and all files, like the Desktop, Skype, teamspeak etc. will be kept. But your desktop background will be changed :P

replies.body: Your files will not be deleted if you upgrade. Just be sure to wait for the little notification icon in your taskbar that tells you that you can upgrade :)
replies.body_tagged: Your files will not be deleted if you upgrade. Just be sure to wait for the little notification icon in your taskbar that tells you that you can upgrade :)

replies.body: I downloaded windows 10 :) Nothing didn't really happen except a very long wait. When you download nothing really changes except the windows icon and some other things.
replies.body_tagged: I downloaded windows 10 :) Nothing didn't really happen except a very long wait. When you download nothing really changes except the windows icon and some other things.

replies.body: I seem to have this issue, where after a few hours of using windows 10, the start menu and bottom bar stop working. The bar pops up (it's normally hidden for me), and gets stuck. All my icons off it, and off my desktop disappear, and I can;t click anything. And because of this I have to constantly restart my PC. Anyone know what I could do?
replies.body_tagged: I seem to have this issue, where after a few hours of using windows 10, the start menu and bottom bar stop working. The bar pops up (it's normally hidden for me), and gets stuck. All my icons off it, and off my desktop disappear, and I can;t click anything. And because of this I have to constantly restart my PC. Anyone know what I could do?

replies.body: does it improve your Minecraft FPS if you upgrade to Windows 10?
replies.body_tagged: does it improve your Minecraft FPS if you upgrade to Windows 10?

replies.body:
xD, although my PC as fine :D

@et477: It has improved my frames. My minimum frame-rate is still the same (around 80), although my maximum frame-rate has gone from 250fps to a whopping 600.
replies.body_tagged:
xD, although my PC as fine :D

@et477: It has improved my frames. My minimum frame-rate is still the same (around 80), although my maximum frame-rate has gone from 250fps to a whopping 600.

replies.body: It depends on what computer you used and how it is/was configured. I can definetly say that your fps won't be worse (if you installed all drivers etc.). And if you lucky, then you get much fps more. I got like 50-75 :P
replies.body_tagged: It depends on what computer you used and how it is/was configured. I can definetly say that your fps won't be worse (if you installed all drivers etc.). And if you lucky, then you get much fps more. I got like 50-75 :P
